取得資料失敗: Failed to obtain data, please try again later.
此遊戲紀錄僅列出各遊戲的當日總和，若您需要查詢各遊戲的詳細記錄，請於各遊戲中的遊: The record only lists the daily total number. If you need to check the detailed records of each game, please check it on each game platform.
各平台遊戲紀錄查詢方式和路徑不盡相同，此處無法一一列舉說明，請各位玩家見諒。: Each game company has different methods and routes for viewing game records. We are not able to list them all here, please understand.
各遊戲統計遊戲紀錄之時間有可能不盡相同，可能無法進行即時核對，發現金額計算有所差: It may not be possible to check/inquire in real time because the statistics time of each game may be different. Please try again later when there is a discrepancy in the calculation of the amount.
※遊戲紀錄統計時間從1分鐘~隔日統計都是有可能的。: ※Please note that game record statistics time is possible from 1 minute to the next day.
遊戲記錄統計由於每間廠商同步資訊時間可能稍有不同，若有發現即時記錄不同，請稍後重: The time it takes to sync varies from company to company. If you can't view the records, please try again later.
